meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one thousandth of an inch.
meanings.sent1: The wire diameter is measured in mils.
meanings.sent2: The circuit board thickness is usually specified in mils.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally cut the paper into tiny mils.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so precise, she could distinguish between two mils.
meanings.sent5: The mil measurement was so small, it required a magnifying glass to see.

meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Bangladesh, equal to one hundredth of a taka.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his taka for mils at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was quoted in mils.
meanings.sent3: She found a few extra mils in her pocket.
meanings.sent4: The mils in his wallet added up to a significant amount.
meanings.sent5: The mil bills were neatly stacked in the cash register.

meanings.definition: A member of a people living in the Solomon Islands.
meanings.sent1: The mils are known for their unique cultural traditions.
meanings.sent2: She befriended a group of mils during her visit to the Solomon Islands.
meanings.sent3: The mils organized a festive celebration on the island.
meanings.sent4: The mil community welcomed her with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The mil children played joyfully in the village square.
